original_text: If thou at all take thy neighbour's raiment to pledge, thou shalt deliver it unto him by that the sun goeth down:
korean_text: 네가 만일 이웃의 옷을 전당 잡거든 해가 지기 전에 그에게 돌려보내라

sentences.original_text: If thou at all take thy neighbour's raiment to pledge,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 네가 이웃의 옷을 물건으로 잡히거든,

sentences.original_text: thou shalt deliver it unto him
by that the sun goeth down:
